appetizers.name: Chips n' Dip

appetizers.description: A variety of meats and cheeses rolled up to look cute 4 u.

cold sandwhiches.description: Just like mama made it... Bland! (And out of the can)

cold sandwhiches.description: The Ungrilled Cheese - For your everyday cheese lover

hot sandwhiches.name: Tuna Melt
hot sandwhiches.description: Canned Tuna and storebought cheese. Worth the $10 we charge for it.

hot sandwhiches.name: Fat-Boy Reuben
hot sandwhiches.description: Double Meat portions? Dressing from the russian mob down the street? We got you.
